News

A new group of young sportsmen from the Belgorod region came to Penza.

On the morning of Saturday, 17 February, another group of young athletes from the Belgorod region arrived in Penza.

The aferist courier has taken some of the money from the victim.

A 84-year-old resident of the Belinsky District lost all her savings, believing that her daughter was the perpetrator of the accident.
16.02.2024

Prisoners in the Penza region are waiting for a pastur day


There's a cold and pastoral weather waiting on Saturday, 17 February. Projections have been made in the regional hydrometheser.
16.02.2024

In Penza, a handicapped collar cannot achieve justice


The head of the SCF, Alexander Bastrekin, requested a second report on the investigation of the violation of the housing rights of the pencil-coloured handicapped. The man once again addressed the Russian Investigation Committee and reported that the problem had not been resolved.
16.02.2024

In Penza, the emergency shore threatened to crash on the gas pipeline.


A resident of the Iron Road Area (disabled I group) complained to the Prosecutor ' s Office that no one drew attention to a shore that was growing near her home and threatened to collapse on the gas pipeline.
16.02.2024

What are the egg sleeves and what are they for?


Some are convinced that children, for their own good, must be kept in singular sleeves. What are those sleeves saying?
16.02.2024

In Penzen province, the driver was unable to bribe the DPS inspector.


In the Penza region, a Tambovčanin was convicted and tried to bribe the DPS inspector, but did not confess guilt.
16.02.2024

In the Penza region, the Prosecutor ' s Office protected the rights of a girl with disabilities


In the Nizhnelom region, a 10-year-old girl with disabilities had to seek assistance from the State. The child needed a lot of medical supplies but did not receive them.
16.02.2024

Cultural Penitentiaries sent cargo to Habarov fighters


Workers of the PEN cultural institutions sent humanitarian cargo to the PSB area. It is intended for a tank battalion in the Poligov region.
16.02.2024

The nigger sold the car to save him from confiscation and sold it.


The resident of the Nizhnelom district had been able to sell the car before the confiscation and was liable to 522,500 roubles for the State.
16.02.2024

Synoptics told me when the freezes were weakened.


The freezes are projected to begin to ease from Sunday, 18 February. Thermometers will show -3 degrees by day and -8 night.
16.02.2024

17 February - Good day


Today, 17 February, just in the morning, make yourself good. Maybe you'll support an old neighbor who's hard to get past the holoid and get to the store. Maybe you should take an animal out of the shelter and give him a good life. Or maybe you could just tell someone the kind words that make it warm.
16.02.2024

In the Penza, news has triggered a family conflict.


In Penza, two brothers, burned by alcohol, had a strong argument when they were watching TV news.
16.02.2024

FS Constellation - results of command


The constellation draws attention not only to those who are in search of a comfortable apartment, but also to those who have worked to build a space class housing complex in the City of Sputnik.
16.02.2024

How do you get a income certificate?


Income information can be obtained electronically and in paper. How do you do that, they told the public service portal.
16.02.2024

Benefits for disabled children on routes Nos. 105, 130, 149 are not available


There are no plans to introduce preferential travel for children with disabilities on inter-municipal routes Nos. 105, 130 and 149 in the Penza region. This was reported in the Regional Ministry of Digital Development, Transport and Communications.
16.02.2024

The Kuznetski Bank ranked the best employers from hh.ru.


As a result of 2023, the Kuznetska Bank ranked Russian best employers in a number of medium-sized companies (251 to 1,000 employees) on the online rerouting platform hh.ru.
16.02.2024

The theft of a cognac for 12,000 roubles may cost a pencil of freedom.


A 30-year-old pencil will have to be responsible for stealing an expensive cognac from the store. He made it without paying for it, but he couldn't stay unnoticed.
16.02.2024

Alexei. Naval* died in the colony


Alexei Naval died in the colony, UFSIN YANAO. The cause of Naval's death is determined by UFSIN for YANAO.
16.02.2024

The fraudsters sent errands on behalf of the head of the Church.


The account of the head of the Climane Oleg in the Telegram, which had been scattered by fraudsters for years, was again in their hands. The official warned his followers at the Messenger.
16.02.2024

Russian tourists stole a boat in the Caribbean Sea and leased it to Crimea


Russian tourists hijacked a boat during the rest of the islands of Antigua and Barbuda in the Caribbean and caught sevastopol customs. This is reported by Telegram-Canal Baza.
16.02.2024

In Russia, the head of school accused the student of stealing lunches from other children and paid for


In the city of Elizabeth Kampcha province, the school principal accused the student of stealing and lost his job. Telegram-Canal Amur Mash reports.
16.02.2024

In Zara, the contractor prepared a 50 per cent road to school


In Zare, preparations are continuing for the construction of a road that will lead to a new school on the Geroy of Russia, Sergeyev.
16.02.2024

Antiseptics led to mass poisoning of children at Russian school


Antiseptics led to mass poisoning of children at the school in the village of Bolshakovo in the Kaliningrad region. This was reported by REN TV as a source familiar with the situation.
16.02.2024

Russian surgeons got 48 magnets from an annual child.


In the Vladivostok of the Primorsky province, child clinic No. 1 surgeons have been taken from an annual child of 48 magnets. This is reported on the medical facility ' s homepage at the " Contact " social media.
16.02.2024

Russian officials were accused of sending rusty UZika to the SVO area


The leaders from Tatarstan have been accused of sending rusty UAZika to the Special Military Operation (SSA) area, and are being handed over to New Notices.
16.02.2024

The fraudsters sold the Russians to a non-existent apartment.


The fraudsters sold 51-year-old Rossiana a non-existent housing over a million rubles. This was reported by the Ministry of Internal Affairs Press Service on the Kur District.
16.02.2024

Doctor cautioned Rossian from grow potatoes


Toxicologist Michael Kutushov warned that growing potatoes, especially at the end of winter and spring, could cause poisoning. The doctor cautioned the use of such potatoes in the commentary for Sm.News.
16.02.2024

In the Penza region, the family escaped from the fire thanks to the beverage.


The message that the house is burning on the street of the Object is on the remote control device at 7:00. When the firefighters arrived at the address, the building was full of open fire. There was a family that lost blood at a safe distance.
16.02.2024

The Penza region will receive 6,638 doses of pneumoccus vaccine


The relevant electronic auction was held on the public procurement portal. The Federal Centre for Planning and Provision of Citizen Medicine is responsible for the regional drug consignment.
16.02.2024

Homes, schools and kindergartens on the GHP were left without heating.


On Friday, 16 February, in a number of homes and social infrastructure facilities, heating was cut off. Reason is a communal accident on networks.
16.02.2024

The cause of the fatal fire at the Zar`a microwave was identified.


The fire at the 5th Ethical House in Zar ' s neighbourhood, which occurred on the morning of Friday, 16 February, was probably caused by the negligent handling of fire.
16.02.2024

On the forest trail, the pencil broke a stone on his friend's head.


A 37-year-old Penza is charged with assaulting his classmate. The crime took place on 24 July 2023 in the valley near Cordon Surk Street, and the guns were stones and pepper spray.
16.02.2024

Architects showed the future childhood area in the Belinsky Park.


The central target of the children ' s site, which will be located in the Belinsky Park by the end of the summer, will be a game complex for older children in the form of huge bells with alcoholic mountains, a hinged bridge and lasagic nets.
16.02.2024

When buying fish, the fountains should pay attention to the eye.


In the Penza region, the results of the quality and safety of fish sold to the population in 2023 were summarized.
